html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-06342012-05-11,  ,  ,  PS, 
ActFirearms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Firearms Fees Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the FIREARMS FEES REGULATIONS in order to waive (1) until September 17, 2012, the prescribed fee for renewing a Possession Only Licence (POL) or a Possession and Acquisition Licence (PAL), including the prescribed fee for upgrading from a POL to a PAL regardless of the associated privileges; and (2) from September 18, 2012 until May 16, 2013, the prescribed fee for renewing a firearms licence with solely non-restricted privileges, including the prescribed fee for upgrading from a POL to a PAL with solely non-restricted privileges.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0101 Publication Date: 2012-05-23
AttachmentsAttachment
